trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Greeley
There were no other sightings in Greeley on or around March 16th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsHI ! I LIVE IN GREELEY COLORADO ! I was in my car pulling into my country road driveway when I saw something come out of a cloud. I drove down my dirt road after I backed up and went to see what it was. Out emerged a shimmering Gold Egg, It hovered there. It was silent, It was about 25-30 feet long? it then backed up into the cloud after it hovered over me. Its gold color shimmering and pulsing..
